mapper.insert: insert into MEDIC_MONITOR_DSA ( id, gmt_created, gmt_creator, gmt_updated, gmt_updator, is_deleted, accident_id, status, has_accident, equipment_id, equipment_category, report_org_id, UPDATE MEDIC_MONITOR_DSA SET IS_DELETED = 'Y' WHERE STATUS = '暂存'
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEDIC_MONITOR_DSA as RPT, MEDIC_ORGANIZATION as ORG1, MEDIC_ORGANIZATION as ORG2 WHERE RPT.report_org_id = ORG1.id AND ORG1.higher_org = ORG2.id AND RPT.is_deleted = 'N' AND RPT.status = '已评价' AND RPT.quality_status = '未评估' AND RPT.quality_status = #{evaluateStatus} AND RPT.id in
#{item}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEDIC_MONITOR_DSA SET quality_hand_grade_total = #{qualityHandGradeTotal}, quality_hand_grade_JSON = #{qualityHandGradeJSON}, quality_status='已评估' WHERE Id = #{observeId}
